resources.string: Couldn\'t find a GDG in your region? Great, go ahead and start one. Fill the form below and expect to hear from us shortly!
Tell us a bit more about why do you want to start a GDG
Tell us a bit more about why do you want to start a GDG
Got your application request!! Oh well, not really. This is a test form just for educational purposes. If you really want to submit your application please visit the website!
Submitted, no need to submit again!

GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons. Google Developers supports and recognizes GDG chapters, but doesn\'t own or manage them.

Run by passionate individuals in local developer communities
 A group to share ideas and network with fellow developers
 A place to learn about Google technologies and development tools
 Open to and free for all interested
